properties.name: size
properties.description: Define <width> <height>

description.value: `name [ url(...) ]` Name of the class in the script, Such a class can define methods, properties and event handling methods of the whole class of elements this style applies to.
`functionName [ url(...) ]` One or list of name/url pairs. functions are called once on initialization.

properties.name: font-rendering-mode
properties.description: Font rendering algorithms for quality/speed.

values.name: sub-pixel
values.description: Higher quality rendering, letters are place between pixels.

properties.name: hit-margin
properties.description: defines hover area of the element. Positive values increase hover area and negative values decrease it. Hit margins are calculated from border box of the element.

properties.name: context-menu
properties.description: Use as custom (right click) context menu

description.value: `style-set-name` - style set that defines styles of vertical scrollbar.
`style-set-name` - style set that defines styles of horizontal scrollbar.

properties.name: flow
properties.description: Direction of child elements flow. This attribute defines type of layout manager (LM) used by the block container.

properties.name: flow-columns
properties.description: Define lists of column size defintions of the grid.

properties.name: flow-rows
properties.description: Define lists of row size defintions of the grid.

properties.name: horizontal-align
properties.description: Horizontal alignment of content

properties.name: border-spacing
properties.description: Defines spacing between all direct child elements (inter-cell spacing);

properties.name: style-set
properties.description: named block of style rules declarations that are applied to elements DOM sub-tree.

properties.name: text-selection
properties.description: Define text color and background of selected text.

properties.name: text-selection-color
properties.description: Color of selected text.

properties.name: text-selection-caret-color
properties.description: Color of cursor(caret).

properties.name: text-selection-background-color
properties.description: Background color of text selection.

properties.name: foreground
properties.description: has the same set of attributes as background, but is drawn on top of everything.

properties.name: foreground-color
properties.description: Sets the background color of an element.

properties.name: foreground-attachment

values.name: fixed
values.description: The foreground is fixed with regard to the viewport. In paged media where there is no viewport, a 'fixed' foreground is fixed with respect to the page box and therefore replicated on every page.

values.name: local
values.description: The foreground is fixed with regard to the element’s contents: if the element has a scrolling mechanism, the foreground scrolls with the element’s contents.

values.name: scroll
values.description: The foreground is fixed with regard to the element itself and does not scroll with its contents. (It is effectively attached to the element’s border.)

properties.description: Specifies whether the foreground images are fixed with regard to the viewport ('fixed') or scroll along with the element ('scroll') or its contents ('local').

properties.name: foreground-image

values.name: none
values.description: Counts as an image layer but draws nothing.

properties.description: Sets the foreground image(s) of an element.

properties.name: foreground-position
properties.description: Specifies the initial position of the foreground image(s) (after any resizing) within their corresponding foreground positioning area.

properties.name: foreground-repeat

values.name: stretch
values.description: Image is stretched to fill background in full. This is the same mode as rendering of image in element. If stretch is combined with keep-ratio then images is resized with preservation of aspect ratio. To position such an image use foreground-position attribute.

properties.description: Specifies how foreground images are tiled after they have been sized and positioned.

properties.name: foreground-image-cursor
properties.description: Used when foreground-repeat has no-repeat value to define when mouse hovers foreground-image area.

properties.name: list-marker-color
properties.description: Sets the color of the list marker

properties.name: list-marker-size
properties.description: Sets the size of the list marker

properties.name: list-marker-style
properties.description: Sets the style of the list marker.

values.name: hidden-scroll
values.description: The scrollbar is not shown but content of the element is scrollable.

values.name: scroll-indicator
values.description: Element shows scroll position indicator when mouse is hovering this element.

values.name: none
values.description: That's an equivalent of defining `{ overflow:visible; min-width:min-content; min-height:min-content; }`

description.value: `scroll-manner( animation:false, step:auto... )` define scroll animation and behavior.
`scroll-manner( animation:false, step:auto... )` define scroll animation and behavior.
`scroll-manner( animation:false, step:auto... )` define scroll animation and behavior.
defines mapping of directional related properties. `left-to-right(border,margin)`

properties.name: popup-position
properties.description: Popup position relative to the element that requested the popup (anchor element).

values.name: at-tail
values.description: popup appears as popup element of the <select> - underneath the anchor element. Or if not enough space - on top of it.

values.name: at-end
values.description: popup appears aside of the anchor (like secondary popup menu). Particular side is determined by available space and directionality.

values.name: at-start
values.description: normally appears on the left of anchor. For RTL direction - on the right.
